Windlord::

Windlord nodded and asked "and your commander is in this planet?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Terrataur::
>        "Well you see...  Our commander was terrified of doing 
anything that 
> might hurt people.  So he had Pyrotaur here," She gestures to 
Pyrotaur, "make 
> him more aggressive.  It went overboard and Aerotaur tried to stop 
him.  It 
> went badly for Aerotaur."
